description: Shirts don’t get any more comfortable than this: Övik Twill Shirt is made from a lovely, heavy flannel in high-quality organic cotton. Soft yet robust, and it only gets better with use. Wear it as it is, or on top of a t-shirt or base-layer sweater. Large chest pockets take care of essential items and the yoke and elbows are reinforced with G-1000 Eco for extra durability
name: Fjallraven Ovik Twill Shirt LS - Mens
